note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Access to clean fuels for cooking vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Access to clean fuels for cooking is vital in reducing the burden of health and mortality impacts of indoor air pollution. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.

display.name: Access to clean fuels and technologies for cooking
